metadata.creator: phoenelai
metadata.description: The second release from drone-artists phoenelai on 2063music. Phoenelai did releases on octagone, retinascan, 2063 and fidgetstone. This ep is more like going some step behind to get more ahead. Very minimal patterns meet reverbs and drones to develop a deep ambient. An ambient that you probably know from Aphex Twin 'selected work'. A work from this ep was also part in 'wireless digital music' compilation. 63music050. The three cover-artworks are explorations from 020200 into rebuilding structures, where pixelnoise meets complex strange-attractors mathematics and pseudorandom-function.
metadata.title: Phoenelai - Rebuilding The Structures [63_052]
metadata.subject: Illbient
